item.title: LISTEN: Michael Lewis Revisits ‘The Big Short’ for Pushkin Industries’ Fall Slate; Jem Aswad Goes Inside David Byrne’s Brain
item.description: Pushkin Industries is revving up a broad slate of shows for the fall as the audio studio looks to capitalize on the “network effect” among its creators and hosts that has been built up sin
